question: What is Bachelor of Technology in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science (AI & DS)?
paraphrase_question: What is the Bachelor of Technology program in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science (AI & DS)?
answer: Bachelor of Technology in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science (AI & DS) is an engineering program started in the academic year 2022â€“23 under Nitte Deemed to be University. It aims to create experts in the domain of data science by providing technical skills in data processing, analysis, and visualization for real-time applications across various domains. For more information please visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-AI&DS.php#Overview

question: What are the key objectives of the AI & DS program?
paraphrase_question: What are the main goals of the AI & DS program?
answer: The key objectives of the AI & DS program include equipping students with the technical skills to perform data processing, analysis, and visualization; providing knowledge of methodologies, processes, techniques, and tools from computing and information science to extract knowledge from structured and unstructured data; and fostering the ability to design software systems for intelligent decision-making in business applications. For more information please visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-AI&DS.php#Overview

question: What are the core concepts covered in the AI & DS program?
paraphrase_question: What are the fundamental topics covered in the AI & DS program?
answer: The core concepts covered in the AI & DS program include applications of mathematical concepts for data handling, various methods for data handling and analysis, applications of data analysis in artificial intelligence domains, and the development of data-driven solutions and data visualization tools for analyzing big data. For more information please visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-AI&DS.php#Overview

question: How does the AI & DS program incorporate artificial intelligence concepts?
paraphrase_question: How does the AI & DS program integrate artificial intelligence concepts?
answer: The AI & DS program incorporates artificial intelligence concepts by covering topics related to machine learning, deep learning model building, and the utilization of AI techniques for solving computational and real-world problems. These concepts are integrated into the curriculum to enable students to develop intelligent data-driven solutions. For more information please visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-AI&DS.php#Overview

question: What are the potential career pathways for graduates of the AI & DS program?
paraphrase_question: What are the possible career paths for graduates of the AI & DS program?
answer: Graduates of the AI & DS program can pursue careers as data scientists, data analysts, machine learning engineers, AI specialists, data engineers, business intelligence analysts, and data visualization experts. They can work in various industries such as technology, finance, healthcare, e-commerce, and more, leveraging their expertise in data science and artificial intelligence. For more information please visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-AI&DS.php#Overview

question: How does the AI & DS program contribute to the field of data science?

answer: The AI & DS program contributes to the field of data science by training students in advanced data processing techniques, data analysis methodologies, and AI-driven solutions.
